ttp_template:
<group name="interfaces_next_hop_rd_route">
VRF: {{VRF_NAME | ORPHRASE}}
 Route Distinguisher: {{RD | ORPHRASE}}
  - {{INTERFACES | ORPHRASE}}
  {{ROUTE}} -> {{NEXT_HOP | ORPHRASE}}
</group>
cli_content:
VRF: Customer-1
 Route Distinguisher: 65000:1
 Interfaces:
   - GigabitEthernet1/0/1
   - GigabitEthernet1/0/2
 Routes:
   10.10.10.0/24 -> next hop 192.168.1.1
   10.20.20.0/24 -> next hop 192.168.1.2

VRF: Customer-2
 Route Distinguisher: 65000:2
 Interfaces:
   - GigabitEthernet1/0/3
 Routes:
   172.16.0.0/16 -> next hop 192.168.1.3
textfsm_template:
Value VRF_NAME (\S+)
Value RD (\d+:\d+)
Value INTERFACES (.+)
Value ROUTE (.+)
Value NEXT_HOP (next hop \d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+)

Start
  ^VRF:\s+${VRF_NAME}\s*$$
  ^\s*Route\s+Distinguisher:\s+${RD}\s*$$
  ^\s*Interfaces:\s*$$
  ^\s*-\s+${INTERFACES}\s* -> Continue.Record
  ^\s*Routes:\s*$$
  ^\s*${ROUTE}\s+->\s+${NEXT_HOP}\s*$$ -> Continue.Record
